mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode,sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode,gugunName from guguncode where gugunCode like concat(#{si},'%') order by gugunName
select no,businessName,businessType,address,let,lng,dongCode from aroundbusinessarea where dongCode like concat(#{dong},'%') limit 100

select h.aptCode, h.aptName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dongName, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) dealAmount from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{code} order by aptName;
